Field Detail

POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS

static final java.lang.String POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS
When an Exchange is created, the target endpoint may not yet be known, or the service, interface, or binding for that matter. The corresponding properties of an Exchange are therefore optional. However, there may be a list of potential endpoints that are known, typically based on the protocol specific address the input message was received on. These potential endpoints can be specified using the POSSIBLE_ENDPOINTS property. The value of the property is a java.util.List of Constant Field Values

SECURITY_CONTEXT

static final java.lang.String SECURITY_CONTEXT
Property to hold a MultiSubjectSecuritySessionContext to represent the security context associated with the exchange.

See Also:
